h2_title: Jiao-Loong of Waves Boss Fight and Guides
img_above_text:
# Jiao-Loong of Waves
Jiao-Loong of Waves is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This water-based dragon is a fan of quick moves and tail whips to try and catch you off guard.
## Jiao-Loong of Waves Boss Fight and Guides

Jiao-Loong of Waves has a limited moveset, so you can quickly pick up on the attack patterns. It will mainly use its tale to try and whip you, either by spinning or flipping around to catch you with it.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," specifically from the boss fight against Jiao-Loong of Waves, a water-based dragon. The setting is a dark, forested area with the dragon standing in shallow water, poised to attack a warrior character. This visual accompanies the guide on how to defeat Jiao-Loong, highlighting its quick moves and tail whips, which are key elements of its limited attack patterns.
